price: (Ɛyε) wͻn a wͻ’agye adie na wͻ’nnfa bͻne mfra wͻn gyidie mu, saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻ’wͻ ahotᴐ mu, na wͻ’ne ateneneefoͻ no.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū īmānahum biẓul'min ulāika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'tadūna
